item.title: 超入門個人用Python Note
item.description: BackGround Recently, there is a new 後輩 joined my team who is very good at Python, so i think i got a good chance to start learning python. ^ ^ What i learned Before: Only know there is a language called python After: But it has many “friends?” Python2, Python3-> 2 python version pyenv -> a tool that is used to change which version pip3, pip -> pip3 is used to download dependency for python2, pip is for python2
